resources.string: This app was made by Andy Waldman

Karate is based on self defence. Being able to defend yourself against violence. Not only does karate teach you how to defend yourself but it teaches you in the art of discipline, respect. Martial arts is very good at allowing you to control your temper as well as allowing you to concentrate on thoughts and relax. At the end of all sessions martial artists perform a short amount of meditation to relax not only the body but the mind to . These skills can be used in every day life and not just to protect yourself against violence.
Ying and Yang, light and dark
Button to Karate Technique Examples page
Button to find and contact us page

KSD karate club is run by Darren Barber a 4th Dan of kenshudo karate. The club started with 10 founding members and now has increased dramatically. Teaching people from the age of 4 to 65+. It is a well establised club and is renound for hardwork, discipline and training (with a little bit of enjoyment to). giving you the skills necessary to protect yourself from violence, how to avoid situations and how to respect one another both in the dojo and out the dojo.
The EVENT will consit of a FREE KARATE lesson with a demonstration from our more experienced martial artists. They will demonstrate the more advanced things as well as very good basics.
